raw_body:
ANANDAPPA – ELSIE (nee Fernandopulle) – Loving wife of late Clarence,​ sister of late Linus,​ Helen,​ Josephine,​ Felix & Lorna,​ grand aunt of Nishan,​ Shehan,​ Sohan,​ Rendl & Avril. Cortege leaves residence No. 146,​ New Chetty Street,​ Kotahena on Saturday,​ 6th April 2024 at 4.00 p.m. for Burial at General Cemetery Kanatte (R.C. Section).
023525
